a_sch_class2g_eve01:
We’re doing some test prep by helping each
other study the subjects we’re good at!
a_sch_class2g_eve02:
It’s more nerve-racking waiting for test results
than it is actually taking the test...
a_sch_class2g_eve03:
I’m just taking a break, enjoying the view...
Maybe I should start my Treasure Hunt soon!
a_sch_class2g_eve05:
Doesn’t the son of some famous professor also
come to this academy? I bet he’s really smart...
a_sch_class2g_eve06:
I’m suddenly in a picnic kinda mood! Wanna look
for a nice place outside the city?
a_sch_class2g_ni01:
Learning is fun no matter how old you get.
It’s never too late to learn something new!
